A helper to create trafo functions for repeated parameters.

Source: R/trafo_on_repeated_param.R
trafo_on_repeated_param.Rd

A helper to create trafo functions for repeated parameters.

trafo_on_repeated_param(fun, repeated_param_id,
  additional_params = character(0L))

Arguments

fun

[function]
A trafo function with the arguments x, dict, tags
repeated_param_id

[character(1)]
The id of the parameter the that is repeated_
additional_params

[character]
Additional parameter ids that will be passed inside the dict object.

Value

function

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
